title: Bali: the release of a soul
creator_credit: United Cinema, Ted Myers and John Phillips
brief_description: To the Balinese, life and religion are one. The film explains this as it explains some aspects of the school system, religion and village life, to the accompaniment of gamelan music.
creator_credit_for_label: United Cinema, Ted Myers and John Phillips
